
# noto-fonts-cjk


## Package

* [noto-fonts-cjk/](https://archlinux.org/packages/extra/any/noto-fonts-cjk/)



## Howto


### install

``` sh
$ ./install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make install
```


### package-install

``` sh
$ ./package-install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make package-install
```


### config-install

``` sh
$ ./config-install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make config-install
```
